record.field: CÁC THUỐC KÊ VỀ THỰC TẾ CHO BN

field.name: help
field.p: Click to add a new prescription.
With shealth prescription screen, you can add prescriptions, assign to the patient and directly send to pharmacies for assignment of medicines

field.name: help
field.p: Click to add a new vaccine.
With shealth vaccine screen, you can record all the vaccine with the date.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to add a new patient.
With shealth patient screen, you can easily find all the information you need for each patients; personal information, medical history, vaccination history, etc.

group.p: This field will allow to connect shealth physician with your preferred Odoo native user. Please note that the user you choose here must not related to any other physician.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to add a new physician.
With shealth physician screen, you can add all the doctors and manage their weekly schedules

field.name: help
field.p: Click to add a new physician speciality.
With shealth physician speciality screen, you can add different medical specialities which will be used in physician screen.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to add a new physician degrees.
With shealth physician degrees screen, you can add different medical degrees which will be used in physician screen.

record.field: Tìm kiếm Vai trò thành viên

field.name: help
field.p: Quản lý vai trò thành viên khi thực hiện dịch vụ
